## Overview

I am a scientist, statistician, ecologist, modeller, and lecturer. I am based in Auckland, New Zealand, on the beautiful Hibiscus Coast.


## Education

- BSc in Zoology from the University of Canterbury
- P.G.Dip.Sci in Ecology from the University of Canterbury
- MSc in Statistics with First Class Honours from the University of Auckland
- PhD in Statistics from Massey University

## Professional experience

I have over 20 years experience as a scientist, having worked at the [Department of Conservation (DOC)](https://www.doc.govt.nz/), the [National Institute for Water and Atmospheric Research (NIWA)](https://www.niwa.co.nz), and for over ten years as a Lecturer/Senior Lecturer in Statistics at [Massey University](https://www.massey.ac.nz) Auckland. I have been a Workshop Instructor/Research Associate for [PRIMER-e](https://www.primer-e.co.nz) since 2017.
